Pets.name: Golden Retriever
Pets.fun_fact: Golden retrievers are one of few dog breeds that have a two-layer coat. Their outer-coat is long and smooth, while their under-coat is soft and frizzy. The two layers help protect the golden from sun cold and moisture.

Pets.name: Chinchilla
Pets.fun_fact: Chinchillas cannot get wet. Their fur is known to be dense and doesnâ€™t dry well. This can cause an infection and possibly kill the pet.

Wild Mammals.name: Brown Bear
Wild Mammals.fun_fact: The Brown Bear is the largest predator in Europe and the second largest in North America.

Wild Mammals.name: Wolverine
Wild Mammals.fun_fact: Wolverines will eat anything dead or alive. They mostly feed on small animals and berries but are not afraid to attack moose, caribou, and deer.

Wild Aquatic.name: Jellyfish
Wild Aquatic.fun_fact: Jellyfish have been around longer than dinosaurs and have survived five mass extinctions.

Wild Aquatic.name: Viperfish
Wild Aquatic.fun_fact: Viperfish have light-producing organs to lure in their prey and they are capable of staying completely motionless for hours at a time to catch unsuspecting prey.
